some_stats_desc: We are always proud to share the trust we have built with our customers in previous years of operating.
products_desc: We have a variety different products on our e-shop. We have total of :count products.
happy_customers_desc: We are here to serve our customers. Until today we have total of :count happy customers.
completed_orders_desc: We put maximum effort to complete our orders and the :count of orders can confirm that.
throttle: Too many login attempts. Please try again in :seconds seconds.
email: The :attribute must be a valid email address.
verified: Thank you for verifying your email!
registered: Thank you for registering. Please check your email for verification.
login_subheading: Using your credentials, please login on our system. Your online shopping experience with us starts here!
reset_subheading: Fill in your email and we are going to send you instructions on your email so you can reset your password.
reset_link_sent: Please check your email. We sent a password reset link!
reset_password_subheading: You can update your password by filling in the form bellow.
register_subheading: Register on our website to get your own personalized shopping experience online. Register by filling in the details below. Its simple and easy!
activation_error: Error while logging in - your account hasn't been activated yet.
basket_empty: You dont have any products in your basket.
basket_quantity_update_err: Some ordered items quantities were not updated.
dictFallbackMessage: Your browser does not support drag'n'drop file uploads.
dictFallbackText: Please use the fallback form below to upload your files like in the olden days.
dictFileTooBig: File is too big (:filesize MiB). Max filesize: :maxFilesize MiB.
dictInvalidFileType: You can't upload files of this type.
dictCancelUploadConfirmation: Are you sure you want to cancel this upload?
dictMaxFilesExceeded: You can not upload any more files.
additional_information_note: If you need to send us some additional information or ask some questions, please write them here.
email_address_note: Please enter existing email since we are going to send your order information on this email. Also, please provide your phone number so we can contact you in case we need further information.
addresses_empty: You dont have any addresses added to your account. Please add new one by clicking on the button below, and select that address for your billing/shipping details after you have created it.
no_delivery_methods_available: No delivery methods are available at the moment
no_payment_methods_available: No payment methods are available at the moment
heading: Do you have any questions?
subheading: Thank you for visiting our shop. You can start exploring our offer and start your shopping experience with us. Enjoy your stay!
cannot_make_purchases: You are not eligible to make purchases
no_price_defined: This product has no price defined
not_available: This product is not available to order
out_of_stock: This product is out of stock
only_count_unit_are_available: Only :count :unit of this product are available to order
moq_not_reached: You need to order at least the minimum order quantity
moq_multiplies_only: You can order only multiplies of minimum order quantity
mov_for_store_is: Minimum order value for store :store is :amount
name: Name
add_products_basket_empty: You dont have any products in your basket.
you_can_view_ordered_items: Here you can view, edit and remove products from your basket quickly and easily.
register_with_us: Its easy to register - it takes only few seconds. With your account you can start your ordering process on our shop.
export_data_mail_message: You can download a copy of your data we store on our servers by clicking the button below.
we_received_new_order_description: We have just received a new order, let's do our best to make this customer happy!
thank_you_for_your_order: We have received your order. Thank you for ordering from our store!
order_status_has_changed: Your order status has been changed!
new_user_registered: There is a new registered user on your shop.
user_registered: The user is :username and has a email :email
we_have_activated_your_account: We have activated your account on our shop. You can start shopping on our website now, by logging in with your account.
there_are_errors: There are some errors in your form, please fix them before submitting again.
sent: We have sent a password reset link to your email!
token: This password reset token is invalid.
user: We can't find a user with that e-mail address.
default_country.description: Set the default country for this store.
default_currency.description: Set the default currency for this store.
default_price_level.description: Set the default price level for customers of this store.
default_availability_in_stock.descriptio: Set the default availability option when the product is in stock. This option will be set automatically when creating a new product.
default_availability_out_of_stock.descri: Set the default availability option when the product is not in stock. This option will be set automatically when quantity in stock becomes less than the minimum order quantity, and product's availability does not allow negative quantity.
default_quantitative_unit.description: This unit will be set when the product is created.
created_order_status.description: This order status will be set automatically when order is created.
confirmed_order_status.description: This order status will be set automatically when order is created and app is set to require admin to confirm orders before processing and payment.
cancelled_order_status.description: This order status will be set automatically when order is cancelled.
completed_order_status.description: This order status will be set automatically when order is completed.
terms_conditions_page.description: This is the default Terms and Conditions Page
privacy_policy_page.description: This is the default Privacy Policy Page
return_refund_page.description: This is the default Returns and Refunds Page
frequently_asked_questions_page.descript: This is the default FAQ Page
login_to_view_details: In order to see more details about this product and add it to your basket, please login with your account or register a new account if you dont have one.
total_times_ordered: This product has been ordered total of :total times.
in_stock_unit: There are :stock :unit in stock, and minimum order quantity is :moq.
update_personal_info: You can update your personal information using the form below.
profile_updated: Your profile has been successfully updated.
address_book_info: You can add your addresses here so you can use them to checkout faster. You can edit an address by clicking on it, or add a new one by clicking on the blank address box.
privacy_policy_info: In this section you can set your privacy policy settings, read our terms of usage, request exporting your account data that we store on our servers and also request account deletion. We care about and respect your privacy.
overview_info: Here, we are going to show you the most important information about your account. You can click on any of the orders to see more details about it.
your_total_orders: You made total of :total orders
request_export: This will pack all your data stored on our servers into an Excel file. When the process is done, we will send you an email with a link to download the file. That's it.
honor_your_right_to_be_forgotten: We respect your right to be completely forgotten from our platform, including any third party services we share your information with. When you request a complete deletion of your account, we will:
delete_your_account: Delete your account and all related data from our database
request_3rd_party_services: Request 3rd party services we use to remove your information
contact_you_and_let_you_know: Contact you and let you know what we've deleted, and where from
we_cannot_remove_some_info: Please note, to comply with the law, we cannot remove some information. This includes, but may not be limited to:
billing_information: Billing information and invoice related data for accounting purposes
company_information: Your company information, if you created a store for that company
products_sold_info: Information about products you sold on our marketplace
let_us_know: Please let us know if you have any questions about this, and we'd be happy to help.
request_a_complete_deletion: To request a complete deletion of your account, please email
process_within_30_days: We will process your request within 30 days of receiving your email
active_url: The :attribute is not a valid URL.
after: The :attribute must be a date after :date.
after_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date after or equal to :date.
alpha_dash: The :attribute may only contain letters, numbers, dashes and underscores.
alpha_num: The :attribute may only contain letters and numbers.
before: The :attribute must be a date before :date.
before_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date before or equal to :date.

between.file: The :attribute must be between :min and :max kilobytes.
between.string: The :attribute must be between :min and :max characters.
between.array: The :attribute must have between :min and :max items.

boolean: The :attribute field must be true or false.
date: The :attribute is not a valid date.
date_equals: The :attribute must be a date equal to :date.
date_format: The :attribute does not match the format :format.
digits_between: The :attribute must be between :min and :max digits.
distinct: The :attribute field has a duplicate value.
filled: The :attribute field must have a value.

gt.file: The :attribute must be greater than :value kilobytes.
gt.string: The :attribute must be greater than :value characters.
gt.array: The :attribute must have more than :value items.

gte.numeric: The :attribute must be greater than or equal :value.
gte.file: The :attribute must be greater than or equal :value kilobytes.
gte.string: The :attribute must be greater than or equal :value characters.
gte.array: The :attribute must have :value items or more.

in_array: The :attribute field does not exist in :other.
ip: The :attribute must be a valid IP address.
ipv4: The :attribute must be a valid IPv4 address.
ipv6: The :attribute must be a valid IPv6 address.
json: The :attribute must be a valid JSON string.

lt.file: The :attribute must be less than :value kilobytes.
lt.string: The :attribute must be less than :value characters.
lt.array: The :attribute must have less than :value items.

lte.numeric: The :attribute must be less than or equal :value.
lte.file: The :attribute must be less than or equal :value kilobytes.
lte.string: The :attribute must be less than or equal :value characters.
lte.array: The :attribute must not have more than :value items.

max.numeric: The :attribute may not be greater than :max.
max.file: The :attribute may not be greater than :max kilobytes.
max.string: The :attribute may not be greater than :max characters.
max.array: The :attribute may not have more than :max items.

mimes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
mimetypes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.

min.file: The :attribute must be at least :min kilobytes.
min.string: The :attribute must be at least :min characters.
min.array: The :attribute must have at least :min items.

required_if: The :attribute field is required when :other is :value.
required_unless: The :attribute field is required unless :other is in :values.
required_with: The :attribute field is required when :values is present.
required_with_all: The :attribute field is required when :values are present.
required_without: The :attribute field is required when :values is not present.
required_without_all: The :attribute field is required when none of :values are present.
timezone: The :attribute must be a valid zone.
uuid: The :attribute must be a valid UUID.
